mapper.insert: INSERT seminar (round_id, theme, content, max_team, is_ordered, is_visible, enroll_start_date, enroll_end_date) VALUE (#{roundId}, #{topic}, #{introduction}, #{maxTeamNum}, #{signOrder}, #{visible}, #{signStartTime}, #{signEndTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id as seminarId, round_id as roundId, theme as topic, content as introduction, max_team as maxTeamNum, is_ordered as signOrder, is_visible as visible, enroll_start_date as signStartTime, enroll_end_date as signEndTime FROM seminar WHERE id = #{seminarId}
